import "../css/Modal.css"; import dbService from "../services/dbService"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCircleCheck } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { useState } from "react"; export default function RegModal({closeModal}){ const[msg,setMsg] = useState(''); const formSubmit = (event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); let regFormData = new FormData(event.target); dbService.registerUser(regFormData) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data)}) .catch(err=>{console.log(err)}); } return(

Register

formSubmit(event)}>

{msg}

We've sent a confirmation to your email for verification

) }
